segments.text: Would you please mail these letters , Lucy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These two are urgent letters and should be sent by registered express airmail . Others are ordinary letters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , who should I send them to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s sent to Mr . Charles . I believe he is in London .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Office address , please . He might be at work when they arrive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should I enclose this commercial paper with these two letters ?
segments.speaker: S2
